page.title: 18WI cont./FORESTERS WALK.
page.content: During 1985 raised money for Life Support Machine _Â£33.(hospital) Cancer Research _Â£17. Sponsered knit for Arthritis _Â£223. Famine relief Ethopia & Maldive_Â£200. Entered Bulb Show, Produce Exhibition, 2 Darts Tournaments & Wensleydale Show {Outings _}Meal Riverdale Guest House Bainbridge, Mystery Tour, Holker Hall & Lake District, shopping/Theatre York {Dale events _ }Blind Sale raised Â£311 2 Whist Drives,Christmas Domino Drive & the Over 60,s Party. Members embroidered a table cloth for the Presidents table illustrating the County Federations Badge. {COVERDALE FRIENDLY SOCIETY.(FORESTERS) MEN only founded 150yrs.Â£1to join Â£1.50per.annum.45 Members. Celebration every Two years 2nd Wed.June.12.6.1985 The Foresters Walk.Parade the village of Carlton,fancy dress,sports & dance.
